questions:
What is the photo about?

B) Daily life and people
C) Architecture and structures
D) Wildlife and animals

B) At the beach
C) Inside a museum
D) In a historic site

A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A passageway leading to an open area

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The tree
B) The stone archway
C) The bench
D) The building

A) A tree

B) A modern building
C) A dense forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?

A) The archway frames the view of the open area

B) Metal
C) Stone
D) Brick

B) A tree and a bench
